--- named_schemas_drop_index.sql
DROP INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers
--- AST
&ast.DropIndex{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 11,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 16,
        NameEnd: 30,
        Name: "indexOnSingers",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers
